name: One Trick Pony
description:
One Trick Pony is a creative services company specializing in progressive advertising, design and digital solutions for a wide variety of industry and client types. We are a company of art directors, designers, interactive developers, writers, producers, and strategists. We focus on our client’s needs as if they were our own.
Some of our key accounts include Virgin Mobile, Virgin America, American Express, Turner Classic Movies & Turner Broadcasting, Hard Rock, Seminole Gaming, Sony Pictures Classics and Gorilla Coffee. Whether we are working with a local brand like Gorilla Coffee, or a national client like Virgin Mobile, our approach is the same – create visually engaging solutions that translate across multiple mediums and demands attention.
One Trick Pony is led by owners Rob Reed and Keith Pizer. After working in New York City for years, Rob and Keith traded the big city for small-town USA. We are located in the “The Blueberry Capital of the World” – Hammonton, NJ., in the heart of South Jersey’s farmlands, in between Philadelphia and Atlantic City.
Despite our small town location, we are still cranking out big ideas and eating a lot of blueberries while we’re doing it.
